nodes.text: A mortar was an indirect fire weapon that hurled explosive projectiles in a high arc. Certain models, such as those used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars, were portable enough to be carried by one clone trooper. Others were more suitable to be mounted on vehicles, such as those on some Imperial All Terrain Scout Transports.

During the Clone Wars, the 501st Legion was equipped with several mortars. During the Battle of Umbara, the 501st used them against the clone troopers from Waxer's platoon of the 212th Battalion, whom Jedi General Pong Krell had claimed were Umbarans disguised as clones.

During the Galactic Civil War, the modular design of the Empire's All Terrain Scout Transport allowed for ease in customizing armaments and tools for specific mission parameters. Mortar launchers were one such weapon that could be attached to the command pod of the AT-ST.

Following the Galactic Civil War, a specialized variant of stormtrooper utilizing mortar weaponry was used by at least one Imperial remnant. One of such stormtroopers was a participant in a skirmish on Tython during Moff Gideon's hunt for Grogu.
